g.text: Windowprocedure Cola Vending Machine 5 GUI Edition
initializing sim_t a struct that contents much of the system infomation,
and wil be accessed using pSim.
Because windows api use a lot of WM_COMMAND
I have simplified it to the base Commands.
Wm_CREATE, WM_PAINT, WM_CTLCOLORSTATIC / INIT_Button(), INIT_Static, INIT_Menu, INIT_Edit
If you could pay it / WTSB_Redraw()
Deposites left over money in change buffer
Check storebuffer against database or in this case pSim->POINTOFCONCEPTPASSWORD
Remove one digit form store buffer
Grant admin right and gain debug money
